text: A licensee under 25-371(b) may transfer ownership in accordance with the provisions of this chapter.
historical:
D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code.

subchapter.text: Moratorium on Establishments Which Permit Nude Dancing.

heading.catch_text: Transfer of ownership of establishments which permit nude dancing.
